00025 IloCplex::Callback Udine::BoundSaver(IloEnv &env, Udine::Config &configuration, const char *tagToCreate) {
00026   return (IloCplex::Callback(new (env) Udine::BoundSaverI(env, configuration, tagToCreate)));
00027 }
00028 
00029 void BoundSaverI::main() {
00030   if (fabs(getBestObjValue() - previousBest) > 0.01) {
00031     env.out() << "</cplex>" << std::endl;
00032     env.out() << "<" << tag << " value='" << getBestObjValue() << "' discovered='" << config.elapsed() << "' />";
00033     env.out() << "<cplex>" << std::endl;
00034     previousBest = getBestObjValue();
00035   }
00036 }
